K&S recognizes human capital to be its most important asset . 
With operations around the globe, K&S adopts fair 
employment and labor practices that  comply with local 
regulations across all sites . The company continually reviews 
its policies for effectiveness and applicability, benchmarking 
against market peers to implement leading practices on 
recruitment, compensation, on -boarding, and employee 
deve lopment . K&S provides employees with an inclusive 
workplace, ample opportunities for personal growth and 
development, so that employees are prepared to  deliver their 
best .

an Open Door policy to voice  their suggestions and concerns.
